title: Week 3 Waivers + Full Stream Ahead, Smoke/Fire - Fantasy Football Podcast for 9/21
description:
Waiver wire time! The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode headed into Week 3! On today’s fantasy football podcast, Week 3 waiver pickups and QB streamers! Who should you target, and who is droppable? Plus, injury updates and a new edition of “Where There’s Smoke, There’s Fire!” Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for September 21st, 2021.
  
 (06:15) - MNF Recap
 (10:40) - Where There’s Smoke, There’s Fire
 (20:50) - NFL News
 (29:25) - Week 3 Waivers
 (30:00) - WR Waivers
 (41:25) - RB Waivers
 (48:50) - TE Waivers 
 (52:35) - DST Streamers 
 (54:45) - QB Streamers
  
 Connect with the show:
  Subscribe on YouTube
